remarks: Version of ~ vtoclgf with one non-freeness hypothesis replaced with a dv condition, thus avoiding dependency on ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 1-May-2019.)
statement:
vtoclg1f.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
vtoclg1f.maj $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtoclg1f.min $e |- ph $.
vtoclg1f $p |- ( A e. V -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
